attributes.action: Change tax paid by those in the front line of caring for Covid-19 patients
attributes.additional_details: As a nation we owe these front-liners more than we could ever repay by saying thank you; as a nation we need a more comprehensive way to do this.
attributes.background: Change income tax paid to 10% as a thank you to those who have risked their lives during this period

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
